name: Colorful Opposites
description:
(Edit: Web and Download version are now equally optimized!)

Refresh page to start game over

Instructions:

W to jump

A to move right

D to move left

Press R to restart current level

Left Click to go through platforms

Right Click to use special ability

Complimentary Colors are your enemies! 

The white pure void is inescapable!

Red: Use this ability near enemies to get knocked back. Pulse above to gain height, and pulse to the side to gain distance.

Blue: Use this ability to get a second jump

Green: Use this ability to crouch below, getting to new areas and avoiding them.

Orange: Use this ability to gain a short burst of speed and invincibility.

Made this for my first Game Jam ever: MiniJam Colors ^2
